title: Metalottery.Win
author: Metalottery.Win
content: Hello everyone  i am new here, i want to share my crypto lottery site article here,can anyone show me a way, where i can post about my site. thanks

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Lottery site? It is related to gambling so you should post it there if you don't know where check this link below.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0If it's a bonus and giveaway you need to post it under games and rounds under that link above

comments.author: UdtaParinda1
comments.body: Quote from: Metalottery.Win on March 12, 2023, 09:44:55 PMHello everyone  i am new here, i want to share my crypto lottery site article here,can anyone show me a way, where i can post about my site. thanks    Dear Fellow for this purpose first you need to find out the topic section before posting the article. As you have mentioned already that your post is Lottery related then it falls into the Gambling Board but I will suggest if you're posting an article to collect the review and feedback you should post it in the Parent board of Gambling rather than posting in the Gambling discussion.If you want to seriously promote your Site then create a professional looking ANN thread in the gambling discussion. It will boost your traffic and user interaction as well. For posting related to your site regular updates you can also customize the thread settings to self Moderator.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Metalottery.Win on March 12, 2023, 09:44:55 PMi am new here, i want to share my crypto lottery site article here,Simply sharing an article rubs most the wrong way, even if it's your article, it would be best if you add a follow up paragraph or two about specifics in the article and what you want the thread discussion to be about.In my experience this is how you get users to interact with the post.

comments.author: Metalottery.Win
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on March 12, 2023, 11:42:32 PMLottery site? It is related to gambling so you should post it there if you don't know where check this link below.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0If it's a bonus and giveaway you need to post it under games and rounds under that link abovethank you soo much, let me check this section
